title: Tech Projects
subtitle: (click to view)
description: CS Projects are my technical projects, includes languages such as Java, C++, Python, and more. It Also Includes fullstack projects that have limited creativity

projects.title: Arabic (CODA) Spelling Correction and Dialect ID
projects.description: Working on a project with Camel Lab at new York University to generate a multi-task model that takes in a sentence and outputs the correct dialectal spelling and dialect of the sentence provided.

projects.title: Draw the word
projects.description: Drawing game. Using a docker image, we created a game that uses a portion of the data from thw quickdraw dataset, to test if a person will draw what word comes up correctly.

projects.title: Feeding Nemo
projects.description: This is a Game Created Using P5js python library. This game is inspied by the game Feeding Frenzy. The game is a simple game where you control a fish and try to eat as many fish as you can without getting eaten by the bigger fish.

projects.title: SWE Prototyping
projects.description: We collected data from a startup in new york, and worked on a prototype to expand their business by creating an app that helps them stay in touch with their users after purchase. The startup, previously "Rise New York", now "Solstice", is a company that sells caffeine vapes as nicotine replacments. Their Website

projects.title: Metric Calculator
projects.description: We created a python package that converts age(day,second, and etc...), time-zones, number systems and distance measures.

title: Interactive Media Arts
subtitle: (click to view)
description: Interactive Media Projects have Front end, Back end, and Fullstack projects that are more creative and have more design elements. It also Has Interactive Art projects, some technical and some not.

projects.title: Love is the Universal Language
projects.description: With a journey through love, poetry and a century old small pottery bowl, a first of its kind, we take a user love story and get a morse code, secret, animation. A love story to share where the latin text is forever deleted, and the morse code is forever remembered.

projects.title: Digital Doodle
projects.description: Digital Doodle is an interactive project usng processing and arduino to control a generative drawing brush

projects.title: LiveCoding - Blur!
projects.description: This is a live coding project that uses Ojack's Hydra library along with tidal cycles on flok to have an interactive live performance. The project is a series of blur effects that can be controlled by the user live.

projects.title: Slendermanâ€™s Scavenger Hunt
projects.description: This is a multiplayer scavenger hunt. I created this game with my teammate as a way of reminiscing the places around campus, reviving memories, and introducing people to our cherished locations on campus, all by using a phone, a camera, and finding as many partners as you wish.

projects.title: Performing Robot
projects.description: As a part of a class project, me and a classmate made our own dancing robot using a collection of identies and memorbal ideas.

projects.title: World Map Search
projects.description: A website that allows users to search for countries and see their location on the map, as well as some information about them.

projects.title: Find your destination
projects.description: With an aim to address the issue of passport hierarchy, this website allows users to find their destination based on their passport and see what kind of visa they need, if they are allowed to be there.
